wss.js

00001 
00047 W.style = function(obj, wss){
00048     if(typeof wss == 'undefined') return -1;
00049     // apply WSS setting
00050     wss = wss.split('|');
00051     if(wss[0] != '')
00052         applyChange(wss[0], false);
00053     if(typeof wss[1] != 'undefined')
00054         applyChange(wss[1], true);
00055 
00056     function applyChange(wss, isStyle){
00057         var tmp, latestProp, target;
00058         if(isStyle){
00059             target = obj.style;
00060         }else target = obj;
00061 
00062         var styles = wss.split(';');
00063         for(var i = 0; i < styles.length; ++i){
00064             tmp = styles[i].split(':');
00065             if(typeof tmp[1] == 'undefined'){
00066                 //alert('property missing for '+ wss);
00067                 target[tmp[0]] = latestProp;
00068             }else target[tmp[0]] = latestProp = tmp[1];
00069         }
00070     };
00071 
00072     return obj;
00073 };
